subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Ilnur Zakarin of Russia won the rainy 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Alberto Contador retained the overall lead.
snippet: Ilnur Zakarin of Russia won the rainy 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and Alberto Contador retained the overall lead.
